newsitem.title: MADAGASCAR: Madagascar illegal traders dispersed with teargas.
newsitem.headline: Madagascar illegal traders dispersed with teargas.

text.p: Security forces have used teargas to disperse illegal traders in the centre of Antananarivo, capital of the Indian Ocean island of Madagascar, Radio Madagascar reported.
The radio said late on Saturday that hundreds of small traders had ignored orders closing the capital's central market for rehabilitation.

Between 6,000 and 7,000 traders were affected by the closure. Most respected the order but others, some of whom had been accused of tax evasion, continued to operate in the area, the radio said. No arrests were reported.
